sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Exxon Mobil ( XOM ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.9%.
Year to date, Exxon Mobil registers a 13.4% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ), trading down 0.8%.
Wal-Mart Stores is showing a gain of 11.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.1%, and Merck & Co. ( MRK ), trading up 1.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
